# Praat met je Boekhouding

> Connect Exact Online accounting software with AI assistants like ChatGPT, Claude, and Copilot via the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

## About

Praat met je Boekhouding is a cloud-hosted MCP server that provides read-only access to Exact Online accounting data. Users can query their bookkeeping in natural language through any MCP-compatible AI assistant.

- Company: Chef Data B.V. (Netherlands)
- Website: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl
- MCP Server: https://api.praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/mcp
- Documentation: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/docs

## Features

- 47 read-only tools for Exact Online financial data
- Invoices (sales, purchase, outstanding)
- Financial reports (P&L, trial balance, cashflow forecast)
- Bank transactions and GL accounts
- Aging analysis (receivables & payables)
- VAT summary and budget comparison
- CRM (opportunities, sales funnel)
- Projects, time tracking, billing
- Multi-division support
- OAuth 2.1 authentication with PKCE
- Demo mode available for testing

## Supported AI Platforms

- Claude Desktop & Claude Code (via MCP)
- ChatGPT (via MCP)
- Microsoft Copilot (via MCP)
- Cursor, Windsurf, and other MCP-compatible tools

## Getting Started

- Docs: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/docs
- Setup Guide: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/setup
- Pricing: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/pricing
- Demo: https://praatmetjeboekhouding.nl/exact/probeer
